ðŸ“– Summary: 4ga Boards is a straightforward realtime Kanban board system designed for intuitive task tracking and project management. It features an elegant dark mode, collapsible lists, multitasking capabilities, and multiple language support. The platform aims to supercharge team productivity with features like real-time updates, SSO login, and a simplistic design.
